description: Hackathon is a 48-hour coding challenge.
Participants collaborate in teams or individually.
It involves solving real-world problems.
Participants can showcase their innovative ideas.
Winners receive exciting prizes and recognition.
Winners receive exciting prizes and recognition.
rules: Code all night and all day.
No plagiarism; originality is mandatory.
Teams can have up to 5 members.
Use of third-party libraries is allowed but must be disclosed.
All submissions must be made before the deadline.
Participants must adhere to the event schedule.
